name: Seastone Handcuffs #2
description: A pair of handcuffs made from seastone, a rare mineral that neutralizes Devil Fruit powers and drains the strength of Devil Fruit users. This specific pair is numbered '2' and requires a matching key to unlock.
abilities: Drains energy from Devil Fruit users
Cannot be broken by normal means
significance: Accidentally used by Sogeking to handcuff himself to Zoro, creating a challenging handicap during their battle against Kaku and Jabra

keyEvents.description: Sogeking accidentally handcuffs himself to Zoro while trying to use them against CP9 agents

name: CP9 Key
description: One of the five keys held by CP9 agents. Only one of these keys can unlock the handcuffs binding Nico Robin. The Straw Hats must collect and test all keys to find the correct one.
significance: Part of the critical mission to free Robin from her seastone handcuffs. Nami successfully steals this key from Kumadori.

keyEvents.description: Nami steals Kumadori's key during her escape from him
